subject: p15192710
History: Recent cough in a patient with AML, history of graft-versus-host disease.
Findings: PA and lateral upright chest radiographs were reviewed in comparison to. The heart size and mediastinum are unremarkable. The lungs are essentially clear. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax is seen. There is interval improvement of left lower lung opacity seen on the prior examination.
